name: Chicken (or Turkey), Ginger and Vegetable Broth
author: Daylesford
ingredients:
- 2.5ltr chicken stock
- 400g shredded mix of red onion, carrot, cabbage, leek, celeriac or celery, and kale
- ~2cm fresh ginger, finely chopped
- 500g cooked chicken or turkey meat, torn into strips
- salt and pepper
- 3 tbsp chopped fresh parsley
- 2 tbsp chopped fresh chervil
instructions:
- Bring the stock to the boil, add all the prepared vegetables and the gineger, and simmer for about 5 minutes, until all the vegetables are soft.
- Add the chicken or turkey and bring back to the boild, then take off the heat.
- Taste and adjust the seasoning as necessary, and sprinkle with the herbs before serving.
